医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
个人选择推动年轻人戒酒，以大麻作为常见替代品最近的一项研究表明，个人决定，例如不感兴趣和避免醉酒，是年轻人戒酒的主要原因，而经济问题也发挥了重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Personal-choices-drive-young-adults-alcohol-abstinence-with-cannabis-as-a-common-substitute.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Personal-choices-drive-young-adults-alcohol-abstinence-with-cannabis-as-a-common-substitute.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36223c81-150c-4afd-92c4-3ddaadf858a8 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 23:55:00 -0400 Personal choices drive young adults' alcohol abstinence with cannabis as a common substitute
密苏里州质量改进计划节省了数百万美元并改善了老年人护理密苏里大学的一名研究人员开发了一项计划，可以提高护理质量并减少疗养院本可避免的住院治疗——；为密苏里州疗养院和医疗保险节省数百万美元，并允许密苏里州疗养院投入更多资金来留住最熟练的员工。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Quality-Improvement-Program-for-Missouri-saves-millions-and-enhances-elder-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Quality-Improvement-Program-for-Missouri-saves-millions-and-enhances-elder-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b6c7af1-9b4d-4c2b-9bb7-3b1e522fda50 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 23:54:00 -0400 Quality Improvement Program for Missouri saves millions and enhances elder care
科学家发现出生体重与儿童肥胖引起的健康并发症风险之间的联系哥本哈根大学的科学家发现出生体重与儿童时期肥胖引起的健康并发症的风险之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Scientists-discover-link- Between-birthweight-and-risk-of-health-complications-from-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Scientists-discover-link- Between-birthweight-and-risk-of-health-complications-from-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=348a442b-7537-4580-938b-76508f69f82b Mon, 24 Jun 2024 23:50:20 -0400 Scientists discover link between birthweight and risk of health complications from childhood obesity
英国临床试验中首个儿童接受颅骨安装式癫痫装置Oran 八年来一直患有严重癫痫发作，经常需要复苏，他是 2023 年 10 月在大奥蒙德街医院植入该设备的英国第一个儿童，当时他 12 岁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/First-child-receives-skull-mounted-epilepsy-device-in-UK-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/First-child-receives-skull-mounted-epilepsy-device-in-UK-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b1112bd-7cb8-41a3-b95d-9e187d58617f Mon, 24 Jun 2024 23:16:52 -0400 First child receives skull-mounted epilepsy device in UK clinical trial
积极情绪技能可改善医护人员的福祉COVID-19 大流行加剧了美国医护人员本已上升的倦怠率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Positive-emotion-skills-improve-health-care-workers-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Positive-emotion-skills-improve-health-care-workers-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1612151-da75-4d3f-947e-1673760a7e10 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 23:12:18 -0400 Positive emotion skills improve health care workers' well-being
小鼠研究表明妊娠期 CBD 暴露会改变后代行为和大脑功能大麻二酚（CBD）是大麻中的活性成分之一，被认为是安全的，因为它不会引起“兴奋”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Mouse-studies-suggest-gestational-CBD-exposure-alters-offspring-behavior-and-brain-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Mouse-studies-suggest-gestational-CBD-exposure-alters-offspring-behavior-and-brain-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85e97cc6-6814-4abb-892b-0660b9847c66 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 23:05:09 -0400 Mouse studies suggest gestational CBD exposure alters offspring behavior and brain function
创新指纹技术可高精度检测结核病抗生素萨里大学领导的一项新研究表明，医生可能很快只需指纹即可检查结核病患者是否正在服用抗生​​素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Innovative-fingerprint-technique-detects-TB-antibiotics-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Innovative-fingerprint-technique-detects-TB-antibiotics-with-high-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2f35304-91b1-4ddf-8345-77a60dc688eb Mon, 24 Jun 2024 22:59:53 -0400 Innovative fingerprint technique detects TB antibiotics with high accuracy
怀孕期间吃奶酪与儿童更好的神经发育结果有关研究人员发现，母亲在怀孕期间摄入较多的酸奶和奶酪可以显着降低 3 岁儿童神经发育迟缓的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Eating-cheese-during-pregnancy-linked-to-better-neurodevelopmental-outcomes-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/Eating-cheese-during-pregnancy-linked-to-better-neurodevelopmental-outcomes-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c38a10eb-f0f1-4c78-a4fe-dee44fbfb639 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 22:56:00 -0400 Eating cheese during pregnancy linked to better neurodevelopmental outcomes in children
伦敦大学学院的研究表明焦虑是帕金森病的主要危险因素伦敦大学学院研究人员的一项新研究发现，患有焦虑症的人患帕金森病的风险至少是没有焦虑症的人的两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/UCL-research-reveals-anxiety-as-a-major-risk-factor-for-Parkinsons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/UCL-research-reveals-anxiety-as-a-major-risk-factor-for-Parkinsons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc2037c4-770d-48b5-a213-c46ef702ae8c Mon, 24 Jun 2024 22:52:20 -0400 UCL research reveals anxiety as a major risk factor for Parkinson's
WEHI研究揭示了检测坏死性凋亡的新方法包括液体处理机器人在内的全自动诊断技术有望改善全球数百万炎症性疾病患者的生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/WEHI-study-reveals-new-methods-in-detecting-necroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240624/WEHI-study-reveals-new-methods-in-detecting-necroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a5cd631-4b25-4a33-93eb-fb737ee5db88 Mon, 24 Jun 2024 22:47:07 -0400 WEHI study reveals new methods in detecting necroptosis
